verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More love, more power More of you in my life. (2x) And I will worship you With all of my heart. And I will worship you With all of my mind. And I will worship you{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With all of my strength. For you are my Lord You are my Lord. For you are my Lord You are my Lord.{/lang-eng}
